table.sql:
create table cs_workflow(
wf_id bigint(20) not null PRIMARY KEY,
wf_name varchar(250) default '',
wf_memo varchar(1000) default '',
wf_steps int(4)
)

create table cs_workflow_step(
wf_id bigint(20) not null,
step_id int(4) default 1,
step_name varchar(250) default '',
role_id varchar(250) default '',
required int(4) default 1
)

create table cs_workflow_log(
log_id bigint(20) not null PRIMARY KEY,
content_id bigint(20),
wf_before int(4),
wf_after int(4),
wf_action varchar(250) default '',
wf_reason varchar(1000) default '',
opt_time varchar(250) default '',
user_id varchar(250) default '',
ip varchar(250) default ''
)

create table cs_info_status(
status_id bigint(20) not null PRIMARY KEY,
status_name varchar(250) default '',
status_memo varchar(1000) default ''
)

create table cs_info_category(
id bigint(20) not null,
cat_id bigint(20) not null,
class_id bigint(20),
parent_id bigint(20),
wf_id bigint(20),
is_wf_publish int(4),
cat_code varchar(250) default '',
cat_ename varchar(250) default '',
cat_cname varchar(250) default '',
cat_position varchar(250) default '',
cat_level int(4),
is_mutilpage int(4),
template_index bigint(20),
template_list bigint(20),
is_generate_index int(4) default 1,
urlrule_index varchar(250) default '',
urlrule_list varchar(250) default '',
urlrule_content varchar(250) default '',
is_allow_submit int(4) default 0,
is_allow_comment int(4) default 0,
is_comment_checked int(4) default 0,
is_show int(4) default 1,
cat_keywords varchar(1000) default '',
cat_description varchar(1000) default '',
cat_sort int(4) default 999,
is_sync int(4) default 0,
cat_source_id bigint(20) default 0,
cat_class_id bigint(20) default 0,
is_disabled int(4) default 1,
cat_type int(4) default 0,
zt_cat_id int(4) default 0,
is_archive int(4) default 0,
cat_memo varchar(1000) default '',
app_id varchar(250) default '',
site_id varchar(250) default '',
jump_url varchar(250),
hj_sql varchar(1000) default '',
is_show_tree int(4) default 1, gkzt varchar(250) default '', gksx varchar(500) default '', sxyj varchar(500) default '', gkfs varchar(500) default '', gkgs varchar(250) default '', gkbz varchar(1000) default '', mlsx int(4) default 1
)

create table cs_info_digg(
info_id bigint(20) not null PRIMARY KEY,
supports bigint(20),
againsts bigint(20),
app_id varchar(250),
site_id varchar(250)
)

create table cs_info_class(
CLASS_ID bigint(20) NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
CLASS_ENAME varchar(250) DEFAULT '',
CLASS_CNAME varchar(250) DEFAULT '',
CLASS_CODO varchar(250) DEFAULT '',
CLASS_DEFINE varchar(1000) DEFAULT '',
CLASS_TYPE int(4),
APP_IDS varchar(250) DEFAULT ''
)

create table cs_zt_category(
id bigint(20) not null PRIMARY KEY,
zt_cat_id bigint(20) not null,
zt_cat_name varchar(250) default '',
sort_id int(4) default 999,
site_id varchar(250) default '',
app_id varchar(250) default ''
)

create table cs_info_category_shared(
s_site_id varchar(250) default '',
cat_id bigint(20),
t_site_id varchar(250) default '',
shared_type int(4),
range_type int(4)
)

create table cs_category_rele(
cat_id bigint(20),
prv_id bigint(20),
priv_type int(4),
app_id varchar(250) default '',
site_id varchar(250) default ''
)

create table cs_info_pic( pic_id bigint(20) not null PRIMARY KEY, info_id bigint(20), att_id int(4), pic_path varchar(250) default '', pic_note text , pic_url varchar(250) default '', pic_sort int(4) default 999, pic_title varchar(250), pic_content longtext )
create table cs_info_pic_group( pic_id bigint(20) not null, info_id int(4), att_id bigint(20), pic_path varchar(250) default '', pic_note longtext, pic_url varchar(250) default '', pic_sort int(4) )

create table cs_info_video
(
info_id bigint(20) not null primary key,
att_id bigint(20),
video_path varchar(250),
play_time bigint(20),
info_content longtext
)

create table cs_info( id bigint(20) not null PRIMARY KEY, info_id bigint(20), cat_id bigint(20), model_id bigint(20), from_id bigint(20), top_title varchar(250), pre_title varchar(250), title varchar(250), subtitle varchar(500), title_color varchar(250) default '#000', title_weight bigint(20), thumb_url varchar(250), description varchar(1000), author varchar(250) default '', editor varchar(250) default '', source varchar(250) default '', info_keywords varchar(250), info_description varchar(250), tags varchar(250), content_url varchar(1000), wf_id bigint(20), step_id int(4) default 0, info_status int(4) default 0, final_status int(4) default 0, page_count int(4) default 1, weight int(4) default 60, hits bigint(20), day_hits bigint(20), week_hits bigint(20), month_hits bigint(20), lasthit_dtime varchar(20), is_allow_comment int(4), comment_num bigint(20) default 0, released_dtime varchar(20), input_user bigint(20), input_dtime varchar(20), modify_user bigint(20), modify_dtime varchar(20), opt_dtime varchar(20), is_auto_up int(4) default 0, up_dtime varchar(20), is_auto_down int(4) default 0, down_dtime varchar(20), is_host int(4) default 0, title_hashkey bigint(20), app_id varchar(250), site_id varchar(250), i_ver int(4), is_pic int(4) default 0, auto_desc varchar(1000) default '', is_am_tupage int(4) default 0, tupage_num int(7) default 1000, istop int(4) default 0, info_level varchar(4) default '', isIpLimit varchar(4) default '' )
create table cs_info_article( id bigint(20) not null PRIMARY KEY, info_id bigint(20), info_content longtext, page_count bigint(20), prepage_wcount bigint(20), word_count bigint(20) )
create table cs_info_info( info_id bigint(20), related_info_id bigint(20), title varchar(255), thumb_url varchar(255), content_url varchar(255), sort_id bigint(20), model_id bigint(20) )

create table cs_info_category_regu( id bigint(20) not null, cat_id bigint(20) not null, regu_type int(4) default 0, site_ids varchar(1000) default '', cat_ids varchar(1000) default '', site_id varchar(250) default '', app_id varchar(250) default '' )

create table cs_info_category_model( cat_model_id bigint(20) not null, cat_id bigint(20) default 0, model_id bigint(20) default 0, template_content bigint(20) default 0, app_id varchar(250) default '', site_id varchar(250) default '', isAdd int(4) default 0 )

create table cs_info_sync( s_site_id varchar(250) default '', s_cat_id bigint(20), t_site_id varchar(250) default '', t_cat_id bigint(20), is_auto_publish int(4) default 0, cite_type int(4) default 1, orientation int(4) default 0 )
create table cs_info_tag( info_id bigint(20), tag_id bigint(20) )

create table cs_info_access( id bigint(20) not null PRIMARY KEY, info_id bigint(20), cat_id bigint(20), info_title varchar(255), app_id varchar(255), access_ip varchar(255), access_url varchar(255), access_time varchar(255), access_day varchar(255), access_month varchar(255), access_year varchar(255), site_domain varchar(255), site_id varchar(255) )

create table cs_info_update( gz_id int(11) not null PRIMARY KEY, gz_name varchar(250) default '', gz_day int(11), gz_count int(11), site_id varchar(250) default '', gz_time varchar(20) default '', gz_type int(11) )
create table cs_info_update_category( id int(11) not null PRIMARY KEY, cat_id int(11), gz_id int(11) )

create table cs_info_update_result( id int(11) not null PRIMARY KEY, site_id varchar(250) default '', gz_id int(11), cat_id int(11), cat_name varchar(250) default '', end_update_time varchar(20) default '', check_time varchar(20) default '', gz_day int(11), gz_count int(11), update_count int(11), update_desc varchar(250) default '' )

create table cs_info_workstep ( id int(11) not null PRIMARY KEY, info_id int(11), user_id int(11), user_name varchar(250) default '', step_id int(11), pass_status int(11), description varchar(500) default '', work_time varchar(20) default '' )
